Reading in Data and Formatting Headers and dealing with NA Values
```{r}
data2c <- read.csv("~/dsan-5000-project-kendallgilbert180/dsan-website/5000-website/data/00-raw-data/2c.csv", header=FALSE, comment.char="#")
data2c <- data2c[-1,]
data2c <- setNames(data2c, c("Country","2000","2001","2003","2004","2005","2006","2007","2008","2009", "2010", "2011","2012","2013","2014","2015","2016","2017", "2018", "2019", "2020", "2021"))
data2c[data2c == ".."] <- NA
write.csv(data2c, file = "cleandata2c.csv", row.names = TRUE)
```
